basic_information.scholarship_name: Bill and Jean Worsham Endowed Scholarship

description: Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student majoring in Humanities (if no Humanities majors apply, Humanities minors and Philosophy majors can be considered) GPA 3.0 or higher Must have completed a minimum of 15 hours in Humanities courses Must submit transcript Must submit a resume Must submit a 500-word statement about interest in area study of future career plans

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Freshman   or SIS_Classification is Sophomore   or SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
